text: Hello, I have a background building distributed computers using python3 and asyncio, for processing large-computation work. I am evaluating Julia.

elements.text: Hello, I have a background building distributed computers using python3 and asyncio, for processing large-computation work. I am evaluating Julia.

text: MAybe you’ve already seen it but <https://github.com/JuliaPy/PyCall.jl|PyCall> might be useful for you! If you use Julia to handle the distributed-ness you can always call your existing python code
